The binary distribution of includes two Preon libraries inlib.

listitem.para: The library providing a ByteBuffer-alike abstraction for accessing potentially non-byte-aligned sequences of bits, and a number of implementations.
The library providing the classes, interfaces and annotations for binding a Java-based data structure to a binary encoded representation.

article.para: The directory lib/ext includes additional libraries that may be required to use , depending on your needs.
The directory doc includes a number of PDF documents that will hopefully some grow into a full manual. It also includes the Javadoc documentation of all Preon classes and interfaces.
